con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="GetRequestActivitiesInteraction" targetNamespace="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:GetRequestActivities:1:rivtabp21" xmlns:itr="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tjsi="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:GetRequestActivitiesInitiator:1" xmlns:tjsr="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:GetRequestActivitiesResponder:1" targetNamespace="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:GetRequestActivities:1:rivtabp21"> <xs:import namespace="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:GetRequestActivitiesResponder:1" schemaLocation="https://ine-tit-app04.sth.basefarm.net:20000/vp/crm/requeststatus/GetRequestActivities/1/rivtabp21?xsd=GetRequestActivitiesResponder_1.0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" schemaLocation="https://ine-tit-app04.sth.basefarm.net:20000/vp/crm/requeststatus/GetRequestActivities/1/rivtabp21?xsd=../../core_components/itintegration_registry_1.0.xsd"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetRequestActivitiesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tjsr:GetRequestActivitiesResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetRequestActivitiesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="itr:LogicalAddress" name="LogicalAddress"> <wsdl:documentation>The HSA-id of the source system supporting the service consumer with data</wsdl:documentation> </wsdl:part> <wsdl:part element="tjsr:GetRequestActivities" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="GetRequestActivitiesResponderInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="GetRequestActivities"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetRequestActivitiesRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetRequestActivitiesResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="GetRequestActivitiesResponderBinding" type="tns:GetRequestActivitiesResponderInterface"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetRequestActivities"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:GetRequestActivitiesResponder:1:GetRequestActivities" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:GetRequestActivitiesRequest" part="LogicalAddress" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body parts="parameters" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="GetRequestActivitiesResponderService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:GetRequestActivitiesResponderBinding" name="GetRequestActivitiesResponderPort"> <soap:address location="https://ine-tit-app04.sth.basefarm.net:20000/vp/crm/requeststatus/GetRequestActivities/1/rivtabp21"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Tjänsteinteraktionens namn: GetRequestActivitiesInteraction Beskrivning: Retrieves a list of all activities recorded for a request/order/referral Revisioner: Tjänstedomän: crm:requeststatus Tjänsteinteraktionstyp: Fråga-Svar WS-profil: RIVTABP21 Förvaltas av: Sveriges Kommuner och Landsting</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </wsdl:definitions>

targetNamespace="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:1" version="1.0" xmlns:tns="urn:riv:crm:requeststatus:1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="RequestActivityType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="subjectOfCareId" type="tns:SubjectOfCareIdType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="senderRequestId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receiverRequestId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="typeOfRequest" type="tns:RequestTypeCodeEnum"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="requestMedium" type="tns:SubmissionMediumCodeEnum"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="requestIssuedByPersonName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="requestIssuedByOrganizationalUnitId" type="tns:HsaIdType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="requestIssuedByOrganizationalUnitDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receivingPersonName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receivingOrganizationalUnitId" type="tns:HsaIdType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receivingOrganizationalUnitDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="careUnit" type="tns:HsaIdType"/> <xs:element name="logicalSystemId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="statusCode" type="tns:StatusCodeEnum"/> <xs:element name="eventTime" type="tns:TS"/> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace=" # other " processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="TS"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3}(0[1-9]{1}|1[0-2]{1})([0-2]{1}[0-9]{1}|3[0-1]{1})([0-1]{1}[0-9]{1}|2[0-3]{1})[0-5]{1}[0-9]{1}[0-5]{1}[0-9]{1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DT"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9]{1}[0-9]{3}(0[1-9]{1}|1[0-2]{1})([0-2]{1}[0-9]{1}|3[0-1]{1})"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubjectOfCareIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="^[0-9]{8}[0-9pPtTfF][0-9]{3}$"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="HsaIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RequestTypeCodeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="3"/> <xs:enumeration value="4"/> <xs:enumeration value="5"/> <xs:enumeration value="6"/> <xs:enumeration value="7"/> <xs:enumeration value="8"/> <xs:enumeration value="9"/> <xs:enumeration value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubmissionMediumCodeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="3"/> <xs:enumeration value="4"/> <xs:enumeration value="5"/> <xs:enumeration value="6"/> <xs:enumeration value="7"/> <xs:enumeration value="8"/> <xs:enumeration value="9"/> <xs:enumeration value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="StatusCodeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="10"/> <xs:enumeration value="20"/> <xs:enumeration value="30"/> <xs:enumeration value="40"/> <xs:enumeration value="50"/> <xs:enumeration value="60"/> <xs:enumeration value="70"/> <xs:enumeration value="80"/> <xs:enumeration value="90"/> <xs:enumeration value="100"/> <xs:enumeration value="110"/> <xs:enumeration value="120"/> <xs:enumeration value="126"/> <xs:enumeration value="130"/> <xs:enumeration value="136"/> <xs:enumeration value="140"/> <xs:enumeration value="150"/> <xs:enumeration value="160"/> <xs:enumeration value="170"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ResultCodeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xs:enumeration value="INFO"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" version="1.0" xmlns="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Beskrivning: Grundl��ggande informationsobjekt f��r dom��nen itintegration:registry (adressering av tj��nster)
Revisionshistorik: 2011-06-27 Mats Ekhammar, Callista Enterprise AB Added ServiceContractType
Datum: 2011-05-04 Beskrivning: Initial version F��rfattare: marcus.krantz@callistaenterprise.se</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="LogicalAddress" type="LogicalAddressType"/> <xs:element name="ServiceContract" type="ServiceContractType"/> <xs:simpleType name="LogicalAddressType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Defines the type for logical address according to national reference architecture. Superseeds wsa:To as type for logical address header in RIVTA 2.1.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceContractType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type which describes a service contract. Used in interaction GetSupportedServiceContracts.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ServiceContractNamespace" type="xs:anyURI"/> <xs:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##other" processContents="lax"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
